Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and high-quality materials, this product truly stands out in its category. Considering its exceptional value and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value. For you, I am offering it at an exclusive price of $150. This is a special opportunity to own a top-tier product at a price that reflects its true worth while also securing a valuable deal. I look forward to hearing your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
